e2ee_info.complete: This here direct message channel be end-to-end encrypted. Nobody (even us) can read it except ye an' the person ye be communicatin' with. Ye can make sure this here be true by comparin' this here strin' an'/or image to what's displayed on their screen in real life or usin' another app.
